posts.post_content:
I have the following T206 cards for sale. All graded with grades all over the place.  Includes stars and commons.  All prices include a bubble envelope, bubble wrap, and delivery.   Check, money order, or paypal all work for me. Thanks for looking! My email is [url]agonzdude@yahoo.com[/url]. I will respond to all emails but I might not be lightning fast in my reply tonight.  

Here are the pics with prices:

[url]http://www.flickr.com/photos/iggy-man/sets/72157625744135711/detail/[/url] Stars and a Shag

[url]http://www.flickr.com/photos/iggy-man/sets/72157625744024331/detail/[/url]Commons
**************************************************************************************************

I also have some graded W514 for sale, which from a distance and in a dimly lighted room almost look like a T206......

[url]http://www.flickr.com/photos/iggy-man/sets/72157627376873105/detail/[/url] Commons and HOF

Or if you prefer nice raw strip cards, how about some W517's???
[url]http://www.flickr.com/photos/iggy-man/sets/72157627576854872/detail/[/url]

Lovely Day...
Email sent for King and Evers.

Hi Ignacio,
I'll take the following 5 cards:

Dooin port Psa-4  
Doolan Fielding Psa-3 
Doolan Batting Psa-3 
Dygert Psa-3
Nichols Batting Psa-2

PS- IF THE DEAL FALLS THROUGH ON THE KING CARD, I NEED THAT ONE AS WELL. ;)
